name: Sundown Skies
description:
Sundown Skies is a game where you play as a pilot attempting to defend Synthwave City from an unbeatable number of alien invaders.

You must hold them off for as long as you can, but remember there will always be one too many.

Try to get the highest score by defeating the most enemies and surviving the longest.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - move ship to cursor.

Right Mouse Button - fire.
